posts.title: Moving to the apache 2.0 license
posts.content:
# It's kinda self explanatory.

Basically, I don't want to be *sued*, so from now on, all my new projects will be licensed under the **[Apache 2.0 Licence](https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)** rather than the **[MIT Licence](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)**.
These two licenses are very similar in almost every regard:


## MIT
- Do whatever the hell you want

## Apache 2.0
- Do whatever the hell you want
- Don't sue me

So yeah. Don't sue me, please.
posts.date: Wed Feb 03 2021 23:12:04 GMT+1300 (New Zealand Daylight Time)
